sentences.english: His trousers were slightly too short.
sentences.chinese: 他的裤子有点短。

sentences.english: I need a new pair of trousers for work.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一条上班穿的新裤子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the lower half of your body, with a separate part fitting over each leg

sentences.english: the health service
sentences.chinese: 医疗保健服务

sentences.english: the postal service
sentences.chinese: 邮政服务

sentences.english: the police service
sentences.chinese: 警察部门

sentences.english: the prison service
sentences.chinese: 监狱系统

sentences.english: Workers in the emergency services (= the police, hospital, and the fire service ) are forbidden from striking.
sentences.chinese: 紧急服务机构的工作人员是禁止罢工的。

sentences.english: There has been a decline in public services in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来公共服务减少了。

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["the police, hospitals, fire service, and organizations that provide basic things such as water, gas, or electricity"],"COLLOINEXA":["the essential services"]}
sentences.chinese: 基础服务部门

detailed_translations.english: the official system for providing something, especially something that everyone in a country needs to have, or the official organization that provides it

detailed_translations.chinese: 服务性的；耐用的；服现役的

detailed_translations.english: if someone services a machine or vehicle, they examine it and do what is needed to keep it working well

sentences.english: Try and think of it from the child’s viewpoint.
sentences.chinese: 尽量从孩子的角度来考虑这件事。

detailed_translations.english: a particular way of thinking about a problem or subject
a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment in which food can be stored at very low temperatures for a long time

detailed_translations.chinese: 急速上升；嗡嗡声；[摄] 变焦摄影
detailed_translations.english: a sound made by a vehicle that is travelling fast

sentences.english: financial transactions
sentences.chinese: 财务往来

sentences.english: financial assistance
sentences.chinese: 财务援助

sentences.english: a financial advisor
sentences.chinese: 财务顾问

sentences.english: Organic farmers should be encouraged with financial incentives.
sentences.chinese: 应对实行有机栽培的农民给予经济上的鼓励。

sentences.english: It was a wonderful film, but not exactly a financial success (= something that makes a profit ) .
sentences.chinese: 这是一部出色的影片，但在票房上不是很成功。

detailed_translations.english: relating to money or the management of money

sentences.english: a cold buffet
sentences.chinese: 冷餐会

detailed_translations.chinese: 自助餐；小卖部；打击；猛烈冲击
detailed_translations.english: a meal at a party or other occasion, in which people serve themselves at a table and then move away to eat
if something, especially wind, rain, or the sea, buffets something, it hits it with a lot of force

sentences.english: one of our regional managers
sentences.chinese: 我们的一位地区经理

sentences.english: a middle manager in a computer company
sentences.chinese: 一家计算机公司的中层管理人员

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to manage part or all of a company or other organization

sentences.english: He borrowed £150,000 and used the money for legal expenses.
sentences.chinese: 他借了15万英镑用于支付律师费。

sentences.english: Conference rooms were equipped at great expense.
sentences.chinese: 装备会议室花费巨大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 花费， 消费， 费用； 开支， 业务费用
detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you spend on something

sentences.english: a teacher training college
sentences.chinese: 师范学院

sentences.english: Donna left school and went to art college.
sentences.chinese: 唐娜中学毕业后进了艺术学院。

sentences.english: Some people who want to go to college still can’t get there.
sentences.chinese: 有些想上大学的人仍然无法如愿。

detailed_translations.english: a school for advanced education, especially in a particular profession or skill

sentences.english: I thought the medicine would make him sleep, but it had the opposite effect.
sentences.chinese: 我以为这药会让他睡觉，但是它却起了反作用。

sentences.english: At the opposite extreme, Ashworth’s style is very simple and modern.
sentences.chinese: 截然相反的是，阿什沃思的风格非常简单和现代。

sentences.english: Bob was quicker than Ed? It’s usually the opposite way round.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃比埃德快？通常是反过来的。

detailed_translations.english: as different as possible from something else
a person or thing that is as different as possible from someone or something else

sentences.english: You could write her a cheque .
sentences.chinese: 你可以给她开张支票。

detailed_translations.english: a printed piece of paper that you write an amount of money on, sign, and use instead of money to pay for things

sentences.english: ...a full-time job as a supervisor at a factory.
sentences.chinese: …在一家工厂担任监督员的一项全职工作。

detailed_translations.english: someone who supervises a person or activity

sentences.english: My refrigerator suddenly started kicking up yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我的冰箱昨晚突然出了故障。

sentences.english: The minute Tom came home he beelined for the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆一回到家就直奔冰箱而来。

sentences.english: Letters have been pouring into the office complaining about this kind of refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 办公室连续收到大批信件抱怨这种电冰箱。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, shaped like a cupboard, used for keeping food and drink cool

sentences.english: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.english: the founder of modern science, Isaac Newton
sentences.chinese: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.english: developments in science and technology
sentences.chinese: 科学技术的发展

detailed_translations.english: knowledge about the world, especially based on examining, testing, and proving facts

sentences.english: a stamp collection
sentences.chinese: 一批邮票收藏品

sentences.english: a computerized data collection system
sentences.chinese: 计算机化的数据收集系统

detailed_translations.english: a group of objects, often of the same sort, that have been collected

sentences.english: After 25 years of collecting recipes, she has compiled them into a cookbook.
sentences.chinese: 她搜集了25年食谱，把它们编成一本烹饪书。

sentences.english: The company collects information about consumer trends.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司搜集有关消费者趋向的信息。

sentences.english: We’ve been out collecting signatures for our petition.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去为我们的请愿征集签名。

detailed_translations.english: to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together
to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together

sentences.english: He has read many of the major works of literature.
sentences.chinese: 他读过许多重要的文学作品。

sentences.english: Italian literature
sentences.chinese: 意大利文学

sentences.english: literature on the history of science
sentences.chinese: 科学史的文献资料

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学，文学作品；文献；文献
detailed_translations.english: books, plays, poems etc that people think are important and good

sentences.english: Did you bank that check?
sentences.chinese: 你把那张支票存入银行了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to put or keep money in a bank

sentences.english: She was in an extremely confused state of mind .
sentences.chinese: 她思绪纷乱。

sentences.english: She can’t go home now. Look at the state of her!
sentences.chinese: 她现在不能回家。看看她这副样子！

sentences.english: The country was in a state of war (= officially fighting a war ) .
sentences.chinese: 这个国家正处于战争状态。

sentences.english: Water exists in three states: liquid, gaseous, and solid.
sentences.chinese: 水有三种形态: 液态、气态和固态。

sentences.english: ...reform of the state social-security system.
sentences.chinese: …国家社会保障体制的改革。

detailed_translations.english: the physical or mental condition that someone or something is in
to formally say or write a piece of information or your opinion
State industries or organizations are financed and organized by the government rather than private companies

sentences.english: He opened the cardboard box and took out each item.
sentences.chinese: 他打开纸板箱把里面的物品一一拿出来。

sentences.english: The store is having a sale on furniture and household items.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店正在减价出售家具和家居用品。

sentences.english: luxury items such as exotic spices and perfumes
sentences.chinese: 异国香料和香水之类的奢侈品

sentences.english: The original 1965 bottle is now a collector’s item (= one of a set of objects people like to collect because they are interesting or valuable ).
sentences.chinese: 这瓶1965年生产的原装酒现在是收藏品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔尤指清单上、一群或一组事物中的〕一项，一件，一条
detailed_translations.english: a single thing, especially one thing in a list, group, or set of things

sentences.english: A snake slithered across our path.
sentences.chinese: 一条蛇蜿蜒爬过我们的小路。

detailed_translations.english: an animal with a long thin body and no legs, that often has a poisonous bite
if a river, road, train, or line snakes somewhere, it moves in long twisting curves

sentences.english: measures to protect the area’s wildlife
sentences.chinese: 保护该地区野生生物的措施

sentences.english: the destruction of wildlife habitats
sentences.chinese: 野生动植物生存环境的破坏

detailed_translations.english: animals and plants growing in natural conditions

sentences.english: I sent him the original document, not a photocopy.
sentences.chinese: 我寄给他的是原件，不是复印件。

detailed_translations.english: a photographic copy, especially of something printed, written, or drawn
to make a photographic copy of something

sentences.english: Her grandmother lent her a camera for a school trip to Venice and Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 她的祖母借给她一部相机，让她在学校组织的到威尼斯和埃及的旅行中使用。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used to take photographs or make films or television programmes

sentences.english: a dinner reservation
sentences.chinese: 预订晚餐

sentences.english: Customers are advised to make seat reservations well in advance.
sentences.chinese: 建议顾客提前订座。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement which you make so that a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc is kept for you at a particular time in the future

sentences.english: She was holding a large box.
sentences.chinese: 她提着一只大箱子。

sentences.english: I held the mouse by its tail.
sentences.chinese: 我抓着耗子的尾巴倒提起来。

sentences.english: Employees hold 30% of the shares.
sentences.chinese: 雇员持有30%的股份。

detailed_translations.english: to carry sth; to have sb/sth in your hand, arms, etc.

sentences.english: a mail order catalog
sentences.chinese: 邮购商品目录

sentences.english: an online catalogue
sentences.chinese: 网上目录

detailed_translations.english: a complete list of things that you can look at, buy, or use, for example in a library or at an art show
to make a complete list of all the things in a group

sentences.english: I’ve just started reading a book by Graham Greene.
sentences.chinese: 我刚开始看格雷厄姆·格林写的一本书。

sentences.english: a cookery book
sentences.chinese: 烹饪书

sentences.english: Have you booked a holiday this year?
sentences.chinese: 你今年有没有预订去度假？

detailed_translations.english: a set of printed pages that are held together in a cover so that you can read them
to make arrangements to stay in a place, eat in a restaurant, go to a theatre etc at a particular time in the future

sentences.english: The kids have been really noisy today.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们今天实在是吵。

sentences.english: a noisy engine
sentences.chinese: 噪声大的发动机

sentences.english: The bar was very noisy.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧里非常嘈杂。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is noisy makes a lot of noise

sentences.english: You are advised to deposit your valuables in the hotel safe.
sentences.chinese: 建议您把贵重物品存到酒店保险箱里。

sentences.english: As the river slows down, it deposits a layer of soil.
sentences.chinese: 河水流速变慢时，一层泥土便沉积下来。

sentences.english: I’d like to make a deposit (= pay some money ) into my savings account.
sentences.chinese: 我想存一笔钱到我的储蓄账户里。

sentences.english: fatty deposits on the heart
sentences.chinese: 心脏上沉积的脂肪层

detailed_translations.english: to put money or something valuable in a bank or other place where it will be safe
an amount of money that is paid into a bank account

sentences.english: He was transferred for a fee of £8 million.
sentences.chinese: 他以800万英镑的转会费转到了其他球队。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搬， 转移； 调动， 转学； 转让， 过户； 乘车， 转乘
detailed_translations.english: to move from one place, school, job etc to another, or to make someone do this, especially within the same organization

sentences.english: Grade A eggs must be of uniform size.
sentences.chinese: A 级鸡蛋必须大小相同。

detailed_translations.chinese: 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的
detailed_translations.english: being the same in all its parts or among all its members
a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc

sentences.english: the tropical rain forests
sentences.chinese: 热带雨林

sentences.english: tropical fruit
sentences.chinese: 热带水果

detailed_translations.english: coming from or existing in the hottest parts of the world

sentences.english: a New Year’s Eve fireworks display
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜的烟火表演

sentences.english: Jeff and David were in the back yard setting off fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫和戴维在后院放烟花。

detailed_translations.english: a small container filled with powder that burns or explodes to produce coloured lights and noise in the sky

sentences.english: We obtained a loan from the government.
sentences.chinese: 我们得了一笔政府贷款。

sentences.english: If you ask him for a loan, he'll come through.
sentences.chinese: 如果你向他贷款，他会满足你的要求的。

sentences.english: The company won't keep going unless we can get some loan.
sentences.chinese: 除非我们能搞到贷款，否则公司就维持不下去了。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you borrow from a bank etc

sentences.english: a tennis coach
sentences.chinese: 网球教练

sentences.english: the Norwegian national coach
sentences.chinese: 挪威国家队教练

detailed_translations.english: someone who trains a person or team in a sport

sentences.english: Do you have any identification?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么身份证明文件吗？

sentences.english: His body was taken to Brighton mortuary for identification.
sentences.chinese: 他的尸体被送到布赖顿停尸所确认身份。

detailed_translations.english: official papers or cards, such as your passport, that prove who you are

sentences.english: a sandy beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩

sentences.english: surfers on the beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩上的冲浪者

detailed_translations.english: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake

sentences.english: In an official statement, she formally announced her resignation.
sentences.chinese: 在一份官方声明中，她正式宣布辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陈述， 声明； 结算单， 报表
detailed_translations.english: something you say or write, especially publicly or officially, to let people know your intentions or opinions, or to record facts

sentences.english: My passport expires next week.
sentences.chinese: 我的护照下周就到期了。

sentences.english: Ophelia expires in Act IV of Hamlet.
sentences.chinese: 奥菲莉娅在《哈姆雷特》第四幕中死去。

detailed_translations.english: (of a document, an agreement, etc.) to be no longer valid because the period of time for which it could be used has ended

sentences.english: The new librarian is a friend of mine.
sentences.chinese: 这位新来的图书管理员是我的朋友。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in a library

sentences.english: people of the same nationality
sentences.chinese: 同国籍的人

sentences.english: the different nationalities within the former USSR
sentences.chinese: 前苏联的各个民族

detailed_translations.english: the state of being legally a citizen of a particular country

sentences.english: I went to a counselor for guidance on my career.
sentences.chinese: 我去找了一位顾问给我作职业指导。

detailed_translations.english: help and advice that is given to someone about their work, education, or personal life

sentences.english: The earrings were a gift from my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 这副耳环是我姑姑送给我的礼物。

sentences.english: The clock was given as a retirement gift when he left the police.
sentences.chinese: 这个钟表是他退休离开警局时收到的礼物。

sentences.english: expensive wedding gifts
sentences.chinese: 昂贵的结婚礼物

sentences.english: Enjoy a free gift with any purchase of $20 or more.
sentences.chinese: 购物满20美元奉送礼品一份。

sentences.english: This excellent cookbook would make an ideal gift for anyone just going away to college.
sentences.chinese: 这本精美的烹饪书送给要离家上大学的人是很好的礼物。

sentences.english: a gift for languages
sentences.chinese: 语言天赋

detailed_translations.english: something that you give someone, for example to thank them or because you like them, especially on a special occasion

sentences.english: The judge ruled that she should have custody of the children.
sentences.chinese: 法官判定孩子的监护权归她。

detailed_translations.english: to make an official decision about something, especially a legal problem

sentences.english: The interest rate has been fixed at 6.5%.
sentences.chinese: 利率已经定为6.5%。

sentences.english: The shelves should be fixed to the wall with screws.
sentences.chinese: 架子应当用螺丝固定在墙上。

detailed_translations.english: to decide on a limit for something, especially prices, costs etc, so that they do not change

sentences.english: The book’s theme is the conflict between love and duty.
sentences.chinese: 本书的主题是爱与责任之间的冲突。

sentences.english: Freia’s theme in Wagner’s opera
sentences.chinese: 瓦格纳歌剧中的弗莱雅主旋律

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目；主题；主旋律；（句子的）主位；词干
detailed_translations.english: the main subject or idea in a piece of writing, speech, film etc

sentences.english: A normal working week is 40 hours.
sentences.chinese: 一个正常的工作周是40小时。

sentences.english: She was assessed in the normal way, and placed on the waiting list.
sentences.chinese: 她接受了正常的评估后被列入等候名单。

sentences.english: All I want is to lead a normal life.
sentences.chinese: 我想要的只是能过正常的生活。

detailed_translations.english: usual, typical, or expected

sentences.english: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

detailed_translations.english: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
detailed_translations.english: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money

sentences.english: She excels all of us at tennis.
sentences.chinese: 她的网球比我们打得都好。

sentences.english: I like his smile and his tennis!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢他的微笑和他的网球！

sentences.english: If she decides to go with her sister instead, then I can play tennis with you.
sentences.chinese: 要是她决定和她姐姐一起出去，那我就能和你去打网球。

detailed_translations.english: a game for two people or two pairs of people who use  rackets  to hit a small soft ball backwards and forwards over a net

sentences.english: Housing savings interest rate unchanged from first to last, from the capital market interest rate fluctuations.
sentences.chinese: 住房储蓄利率自始至终固定不变，不受资本市场利率波动的影响。

sentences.english: It may be higher than the note rate because it represents full disclosure of the interest rate, loan origination fees, loan discount points, and other credit costs paid to the lender.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是高于您所知道的利率，因为它完全计算了利息率，贷款发放费，贷款贴息点，和其他信贷成本支付给贷款人。

detailed_translations.english: the percentage amount charged by a bank etc when you borrow money, or paid to you by a bank when you keep money in an account there

sentences.english: "No cable car, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “没有缆车的。” 他说。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that hangs from a moving cable, and is used to take people up and down mountains

sentences.english: All the city’s schools will be online by the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 到年底，市里的所有学校都会连接因特网。

sentences.english: ...the cool stuff you find online.
sentences.chinese: …你在网上找到的好东西。

detailed_translations.english: connected to other computers through the Internet, or available through the Internet
While connected to a computer or under computer control.

sentences.english: They get their money from various sources.
sentences.chinese: 他们从各种途径弄到钱。

detailed_translations.english: a thing, place, activity etc that you get something from

sentences.english: After the storm, the ground was littered with twigs and branches.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨过后，满地都是大大小小的树枝。

sentences.english: The topmost branches were full of birds.
sentences.chinese: 树梢上停满了鸟儿。

sentences.english: She now works in our Denver branch.
sentences.chinese: 现在她在我们的丹佛分部工作。

sentences.english: a branch of mathematics/physics/biology etc
sentences.chinese: 数学/物理/生物学等的分支

detailed_translations.english: a part of a tree that grows out from the trunk and that has leaves, fruit, or smaller branches growing from it

sentences.english: What about the Canadian policy?
sentences.chinese: 那么加拿大的政策呢？

sentences.english: The fugitive is believed to be headed for the Canadian border.
sentences.chinese: 据信，逃亡者正向加拿大边界方向逃窜。

sentences.english: Most English people bracket American and Canadian accents together.
sentences.chinese: 大多数英国人都把美国音和加拿大音相提并论。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Canada or its people
someone from Canada

sentences.english: Please pay the full amount (=  of money  ) by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 请在月底前全额付清。

detailed_translations.english: a quantity of something such as time, money, or a substance

sentences.english: Join now and you will automatically receive 50% off your first purchase.
sentences.chinese: 现在加入，立即享受首次购物五折优惠。

detailed_translations.english: as the result of a situation or action, and without you having to do anything more

sentences.english: They bought an old schoolhouse to live in and built a workshop in the basement.
sentences.chinese: 他们买了座旧校舍居住，还在地下室建了个作坊。

detailed_translations.english: a room or area in a building that is under the level of the ground

sentences.english: I’ve washed your shirt but it’s still wet.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的衬衫洗过了，不过现在还是湿的。

sentences.english: wet grass
sentences.chinese: 湿草地

sentences.english: The man in the boat was wet through (= completely wet ).
sentences.chinese: 船上的那人浑身湿透。

detailed_translations.english: covered in or full of water or another liquid
the rain
to make something wet

sentences.english: There was an old action movie next.
sentences.chinese: 接下来演的是一部老动作片。

sentences.english: Instead of going to see an action movie, take action in your own life.
sentences.chinese: 与其看动作片，不如花点心思在你的生活上。

sentences.english: He trained as a civil engineer (= one who designs and builds roads, bridges etc ).
sentences.chinese: 他接受过土木工程师培训。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to design or build roads, bridges, machines etc

sentences.english: Her signature is totally illegible (= cannot be read ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的签字完全无法辨认。

sentences.english: The school collected 4,000 signatures for the petition.
sentences.chinese: 学校为这份请愿书收集到了四千个签名。

sentences.english: The Ukrainians put their signatures to the Lisbon Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰签署了《里斯本协议》。

sentences.english: Someone’s forged my signature (= made an illegal copy of my name to deceive people ) on this letter.
sentences.chinese: 有人在这封信中伪造了我的签名。

sentences.english: Each child must obtain the signature of his or her parents.
sentences.chinese: 每个小孩都必须得到父母的签字。

detailed_translations.english: your name written in the way you usually write it, for example at the end of a letter, or on a cheque etc, to show that you have written it

sentences.english: She demanded payment in advance.
sentences.chinese: 她要求预先付款。

sentences.english: Payment can be made by cheque or credit card.
sentences.chinese: 可以用支票或信用卡付款。

detailed_translations.english: the act of paying for something

sentences.english: This will take a minimum of one hour.
sentences.chinese: 这最少要用一个小时。

sentences.english: The minimum number of students we need to run the course is fifteen.
sentences.chinese: 我们开这门课程最少要有15个学生。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest amount of something or number of things that is possible or necessary
the minimum number, degree, or amount of something is the smallest or least that is possible, allowed, or needed

sentences.english: I play the piano for relaxation.
sentences.chinese: 我弹钢琴自娱。

sentences.english: Meditation allows you to enter a state of deep relaxation .
sentences.chinese: 冥想能使你进入完全放松的状态。

detailed_translations.english: a way of resting and enjoying yourself

sentences.english: The money will be used for teacher training schemes.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将用于教师培训计划。

sentences.english: a pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 退休金计划

sentences.english: a get-rich-quick scheme
sentences.chinese: 快速致富的手段

detailed_translations.english: an official plan that is intended to help people in some way, for example by providing education or training

sentences.english: The old machine used to make an awful racket .
sentences.chinese: 这台旧机器以前噪音大得吓人。

detailed_translations.english: a loud noise
